article.title: Study of top quark dipole interactions in $t\bar t$ production associated with two heavy gauge bosons at the LHC

multiple_choice_question.text: Figure 1 in the article depicts representative Feynman diagrams for which process?
According to Table 3, what is the value of  β<sub>A</sub> for the 14 TeV LHC?
Figure 4 (Top) showcases the invariant mass distributions of the ttZZ¯ system. Which of the following statements is **incorrect**?
choices: The presence of dg<sub>V</sub> or dg<sub>A</sub> shifts the distribution peak towards larger values.
The distribution for the SM case peaks towards smaller masses.
The distributions for dZ<sub>V</sub> = 0.05 and dZ<sub>A</sub> = 0.05 show significant change in peak positions compared to the SM.
The distribution peak shifts more dramatically with dg<sub>A</sub> compared to dZ<sub>A</sub>.

multiple_choice_question.text: Equation 12 expresses the relative modifications to the total cross section of σ(pp → ttZZ¯). What does the term ρ<sub>g,Z</sub><sup>i</sup> represent?
choices: The pure contributions from operators O<sup>33</sup><sub>uGφ</sub>, O<sup>33</sup><sub>uW</sub> and O<sup>33</sup><sub>uBφ</sub>.
The interference term of the SM with new physics.
The total cross section of the ttZZ¯ process.
The integrated luminosity of the data.
